summary.title: About me
summary.description: I am a software engineer with 4+ years of experience in analysis, design, and development. I am passionate about creating efficient and high-quality software that meets the needs of clients and end-users. I am motivated, detail-oriented, and able to quickly learn new frameworks and concepts. I am dedicated to writing clean and maintainable code, which is crucial in delivering reliable and scalable software solutions

companyList.name: PayPal
description: Designed and developed open banking functionality in loan underwriting, enabling merchants to share financial information with consent. This information can be used at the time of loan underwriting for risk assessment associated with loan lending
Re-architected and migrated loan application withdraw functionality, enabling merchants to withdraw loan applications on demand

Implemented an automated KYB and KYC feature for merchants, which allowed for real-time KYB for businesses and real-time KYC for merchants applying for loans. This resulted in a significant reduction in the time and effort required to onboard new merchants, as well as a reduction in the risk of fraud

Implemented unit tests using Mockito to ensure code coverage and identify potential bugs. I also implemented functional tests to verify the functionality of the application. In addition, I identified and implemented solutions for multiple production bugs. My work helped to improve the quality of the software and reduce the number of defects

Designed and integrated with external APIs to get business and customer data from external services for features like open banking, automated KYB/KYC, etc. This improved the efficiency of data collection and processing, and reduced the risk of data breaches

Took ownership of mentoring junior developers by providing guidance and support on technical topics, as well as career development. Actively participated in code reviews and design discussions, providing valuable feedback and insights. This helped to improve the quality of the software and the skills of the junior developers

companyList.name: OYO
description: Design and development efforts for Ceil Discount feature to cap the overall discount. Worked on building high throughput asynchronous write service
Built and deployed infrastructure for segmentation feature for discounting platform in order to optimise coupon discounting for larger set of users

Design and development efforts for migration of existing coupon discounting system from a ROR based monolith to Java based micro-service with improved code and database design in order to achieve high performance in form of improved latency and stability of the system at a high
rate of throughput (JAVA/RUBY)
End to end integration of A/B service with discounting platform which resulted in significant increase of booking conversion (RUBY)
Build a panel for coupon pre-application to automate the manual process which saved engineering bandwidth

companyList.name: OYO
description: Developed partial discounting capability in discounting platform for use cases such as micro stay bookings (RUBY)
Developed and deployed front end panel for internal use cases such as coupon creation, coupon edit, pre applied coupons listing using React and Redux front end technologies

key_projects.title: Key Projects / Achievements
description: Proposed and implemented new design changes for application withdraw functionality
Received multiple bravos for collaboration, innovation across different initiatives
Idea submission for paypal risk hackathon for loan Requester/Recommendation Engine

certificates.title: Certificates and Awards
description: Path breaker award for consistently exceeding the performance for the year 2021
Path breaker award for providing optimized solution for a crucial bug
Spot awards for multitasking and out-of-box thinking
DataStructure and Algorithms in Zero To Mastery Academy
